attributes.action: Government should commence a public enquiry into grooming gangs
attributes.additional_details: People and victims of this atrocity deserve the right to know why they were ignored and those who allowed it allowed this to happen.
attributes.background: To commence a detailed public enquiry into the grooming gangs in Rochdale and other cities and towns in the UK.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
